alert.note: Alert for Lower Washington County; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 12 at 2:28PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of Utah, including the following areas, Lower Washington County and Zion National Park. * WHEN...From late tonight through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of slot canyons, normally dry washes, slick rock areas, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Lower Washington County; Zion National Park
